mapper.select: SELECT file_ver, fab_date, model_id_dps, output_name, sub_type, colum_name, qty, file_name FROM dps_excel_arycel WHERE file_ver = #{ver} and output_name <> '' and sub_type = 'Cell Input' and qty>0 ORDER BY model_id,fab_date,colum_name

select file_ver, fab_date, model_id_dps, output_name, sub_type, colum_name, qty, file_name from dps_excel_arycel WHERE output_name <> '' and sub_type = 'Array Input' and file_ver = #{ver} and qty>0 order by model_id,fab_date,colum_name

select file_ver, fab_date, model_id_dps, output_name, sub_type, colum_name, qty, file_name from dps_excel_arycel WHERE output_name <> '' and sub_type = 'Array OC Input' and file_ver = #{ver} and qty>0 order by model_id,fab_date,colum_name

select file_ver, fab_date, model_id_dps, sub_type, colum_name, qty, file_name from dps_excel_arycel where file_ver= #{ver} and sub_type = 'Cell Input' and qty>0 AND model_id_dps IN
#{item}
SELECT mps_ver, ary_model_name as product, fab_date as fabDate, mps_qty as qty, model_id as project, tft_mtrl_id as tftMtrl FROM dps_mps_demand WHERE ary_model_name <> '' AND mps_ver=#{ver}
SELECT DISTINCT mps_ver FROM dps_mps_demand where ary_model_name <> ''
SELECT mps_ver, cellin_model_name as product, fab_date as fabDate, mps_qty as qty, model_id as project, tft_mtrl_id as tftMtrl from dps_mps_demand_cell WHERE cel_model_name <> '' AND mps_ver=#{ver}
SELECT DISTINCT mps_ver from dps_mps_demand_cell where cel_model_name <> ''
